author: leif
msg: Added a task to the root build file to build a summary test report.

author: donaldp
msg: Fix all the unit tests that weren't passing (picking up abstract tasks and dummy paths).
Add a property so you can force the build to fail if a unit test fails - ie adding
into the jakarta-avalon-excalibur/.ant.proeprties file will force build to fail if a unit test fails.
Make gump run unit tests at night and make sure gump fails if unit tests fail.
